title: WORKTERRA BenAdmin Selected By Science Systems and Applications, Inc. (SSAI)
text:
WORKTERRA BenAdmin delivers SSAI an intuitive, easy-to-use application for employee benefit administration, enrollment, and Affordable Care Act compliance
(PRWEB) October 19, 2015
WORKTERRA, the easy-to-use, quickly implemented cloud-based benefits administration and talent management system for companies of any size, today announced the addition of Science Systems and Applications, Inc. (SSAI), a leading provider of scientific, engineering, and IT support for customers who seek new frontiers in science and technology, to its expanding client base. WORKTERRA BenAdmin delivers SSAI an intuitive, easy-to-use application to fully manage and complete the benefit election process, while maintaining compliance with Affordable Care Act (ACA) regulations.
WORKTERRA BenAdmin is designed to centralize, streamline, and simplify all aspects of employee benefit enrollment. SSAI HR administrators are offered a fully configurable application to create enrollment workflows to meet their organization's specific needs. Personalized communications such as new hire and open enrollment notifications, plan termination notices, change management notifications, and more keep employees informed about their benefit offerings and help to move them forward toward completion of the enrollment process.
By consolidating data in a single, secure place, SSAI can not only better manage employee data but also ensure compliance with complex ACA requirements. WORKTERRA's proprietary reporting tools enable employers to generate, analyze, and deliver required information including: IRS 6055 & 6056, Forms 1094-C & 1095-C, and Form W-2. Graphical analytics tools deliver real-time, at-a glance insight into an organization's workforce and provide necessary information to complete Safe Harbors and PCORI Fee calculations.
WORKTERRA mobile applications for iPad, Android tablets, iPhone and Android phones offer a convenient way for SSAI employees to access information anytime, anywhere so their workforce is always connected.
About Science Systems and Applications, Inc. (SSAI) - Science Systems and Applications, Inc. (SSAI) is a leading provider of scientific, engineering, and IT support for customers who seek new frontiers in science and technology. For more than 38 years, SSAI has been by their side, aligning with their vision and goals to provide excellent research and technical support. SSAI supports pioneers in science and engineering such as NASA and NOAA and they've made significant contributions to more than 130 Earth and space science missions. SSAI's exceptional services are built on their genuine passion for research and innovative solutions. Their expert scientists, engineers, and IT professionals share a commitment to providing solutions for the unique needs of each client. For more information, visit http://www.ssaihq.com .
About WORKTERRA - WORKTERRA makes HCM easier, less confusing, and more efficient -- no matter the size of your company, today or tomorrow. It's a super-easy-to-use, quickly implemented, and extremely flexible benefits and talent management system that is smart, fast, and sharp. WORKTERRA is a cloud-based technology that's built from the inside out on a platform we designed, own, and continue to enrich through our innovation and passion. All of which ensures easy and fast configuration and enhancements. And because WORKTERRA is a unified system with every module on board, there's no outsourcing to worry about, no third-party apps to depend on. WORKTERRA won't leave you in the lurch after commitments are made or fall short under complex situations. Now, transform the way you manage benefits and people.
Headquartered in Pleasanton, Calif., WORKTERRA is online at workterra.com .
